text: tae a l laoh minmen chea anak theroksaa khnhom robsa trong( mou ha- meat) teryy khn del puokke bamphitbamphy anak pisaamnak puok phe sang pi trong( preah neanea del puokke aahang tha preah teangnoh ach bangk krohthnak dl anak) noh? haey anaknea del a l laoh thveu aoy v nge v ngnoh ku kmean anaknea mneak changaoulobangheanh dl ke laey
